original_title: Audioslave: live debut on the roof of the Ed Sullivan Theater on Broadway in New York City
overview: The band kicked the show off with their first single "Cochise". Followed by "Light My Way", "Gasoline", a second shot at "Cochise", "Like A Stone", and "Set It Off".  The band did Cochise twice, once for Letterman and another time as part of the mini-set.  November 25, 2002
title: Audioslave: live debut on the roof of the Ed Sullivan Theater on Broadway in New York City
